    Subclasses of Item in model
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Accessory
    The Accessory class is a sublclass of the Item class.
    class 
    DisplayItem
    The DisplayItem class extends the Item class, used for displaying products in the catalogue on the screen
    class 
    OrderItem
    The OrderItem class extends the Item class, holding information about each Product being added into the Customers Order The OrderItem class holds the qty, price, item and id associateed with each Product in the Order
    class 
    Plant
    The Accessory class is a sublclass of the Item class.
